trans-unit.source: .NET Core API Reference
trans-unit.target: .NET Core API Reference

trans-unit.source: .NET Core API Reference
trans-unit.target: .NET Core API Reference

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Core, .NET Core API Reference, .NET Core class library, .NET class library
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET Core, .NET Core API Reference, .NET Core class library, .NET class library

trans-unit.source: .NET Core API Reference
trans-unit.target: .NET Core API Reference

trans-unit.source: Namespaces in the .NET Core Class Library
trans-unit.target: Namespaces in the .NET Core Class Library

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of namespaces in the .NET Core class library.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of namespaces in the .NET Core class library.

trans-unit.source: Each namespace contains a set of functionally-related types.
trans-unit.target: Each namespace contains a set of functionally-related types.

trans-unit.source: Namespace
trans-unit.target: Namespace

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: @Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder
trans-unit.target: @Microsoft.CSharp.RuntimeBinder

trans-unit.source: Provides types that support interoperation between the Dynamic Language Runtime and C#.
trans-unit.target: Provides types that support interoperation between the Dynamic Language Runtime and C#.

trans-unit.source: @Microsoft.SqlServer.Server
trans-unit.target: @Microsoft.SqlServer.Server

trans-unit.source: Contains classes for integrating .NET Core with Microsoft SQL Server and the SQL Server database engine process execution environment.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes for integrating .NET Core with Microsoft SQL Server and the SQL Server database engine process execution environment.

trans-unit.source: @Microsoft.VisualBasic
trans-unit.target: @Microsoft.VisualBasic

trans-unit.source: Contains types that support the Visual Basic runtime.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that support the Visual Basic runtime.

trans-unit.source: @Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompilerServices
trans-unit.target: @Microsoft.VisualBasic.CompilerServices

trans-unit.source: Contains internal-use only types that support the Visual Basic compiler.
trans-unit.target: Contains internal-use only types that support the Visual Basic compiler.

trans-unit.source: @Microsoft.Win32
trans-unit.target: @Microsoft.Win32

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that manipulate the Windows system registry.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that manipulate the Windows system registry.

trans-unit.source: @Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles
trans-unit.target: @Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that support safe access to Windows file and operating system handles.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that support safe access to Windows file and operating system handles.

trans-unit.source: @System
trans-unit.target: @System

trans-unit.source: Contains fundamental classes and base classes that define commonly-used value and reference data types, events and event handlers, interfaces, attributes, and exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Contains fundamental classes and base classes that define commonly-used value and reference data types, events and event handlers, interfaces, attributes, and exceptions.

trans-unit.source: @System.CodeDom.Compiler
trans-unit.target: @System.CodeDom.Compiler

trans-unit.source: Contains a type used to identify code that is auto-generated by a tool.
trans-unit.target: Contains a type used to identify code that is auto-generated by a tool.

trans-unit.source: @System.Collections
trans-unit.target: @System.Collections

trans-unit.source: Contains classes and interfaces that define various non-generic collections of objects, such as lists, queues, bit arrays, hash tables and dictionaries.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes and interfaces that define various non-generic collections of objects, such as lists, queues, bit arrays, hash tables and dictionaries.

trans-unit.source: @System.Collections.Concurrent
trans-unit.target: @System.Collections.Concurrent

trans-unit.source: Provides thread-safe collection classes that should be used instead of the corresponding types in the System.Collections and System.Collections.Generic namespaces whenever multiple threads are accessing the collection concurrently.
trans-unit.target: Provides thread-safe collection classes that should be used instead of the corresponding types in the System.Collections and System.Collections.Generic namespaces whenever multiple threads are accessing the collection concurrently.

trans-unit.source: However, members accessed through extension methods or through the interfaces that these collection classes implement are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.
trans-unit.target: However, members accessed through extension methods or through the interfaces that these collection classes implement are not guaranteed to be thread safe and may need to be synchronized by the caller.

trans-unit.source: @System.Collections.Generic
trans-unit.target: @System.Collections.Generic

trans-unit.source: Contains types that define generic collections, which allow users to create strongly-typed collections that provide better type safety and performance than non-generic collections.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that define generic collections, which allow users to create strongly-typed collections that provide better type safety and performance than non-generic collections.

trans-unit.source: @System.Collections.ObjectModel
trans-unit.target: @System.Collections.ObjectModel

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that can be used as collections in the object model of a reusable library.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that can be used as collections in the object model of a reusable library.

trans-unit.source: Use these classes when properties or methods return collections.
trans-unit.target: Use these classes when properties or methods return collections.

trans-unit.source: @System.Collections.Specialized
trans-unit.target: @System.Collections.Specialized

trans-unit.source: Contains specialized and strongly-typed collections such as a linked list dictionary, a bit vector, and collections that contain only strings.
trans-unit.target: Contains specialized and strongly-typed collections such as a linked list dictionary, a bit vector, and collections that contain only strings.

trans-unit.source: @System.ComponentModel
trans-unit.target: @System.ComponentModel

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that are used to implement the run-time and design-time behavior of components and controls.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that are used to implement the run-time and design-time behavior of components and controls.

trans-unit.source: This namespace includes the base classes and interfaces for implementing attributes and type converters and binding to data sources.
trans-unit.target: This namespace includes the base classes and interfaces for implementing attributes and type converters and binding to data sources.

trans-unit.source: @System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
trans-unit.target: @System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations

trans-unit.source: Contains attribute classes that are used to define metadata for ASP.NET Core data controls.
trans-unit.target: Contains attribute classes that are used to define metadata for ASP.NET Core data controls.

trans-unit.source: @System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema
trans-unit.target: @System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Schema

trans-unit.source: Provides support for attribute classes that are used to define metadata for ASP.NET Core data controls.
trans-unit.target: Provides support for attribute classes that are used to define metadata for ASP.NET Core data controls.

trans-unit.source: @System.Data
trans-unit.target: @System.Data

trans-unit.source: Provides access to classes that efficiently manage data from multiple data sources.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to classes that efficiently manage data from multiple data sources.

trans-unit.source: @System.Data.Common
trans-unit.target: @System.Data.Common

trans-unit.source: Contains classes shared by the .NET Core data providers.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes shared by the .NET Core data providers.

trans-unit.source: @System.Data.SqlClient
trans-unit.target: @System.Data.SqlClient

trans-unit.source: The data provider for Microsoft SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: The data provider for Microsoft SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: @System.Data.SqlTypes
trans-unit.target: @System.Data.SqlTypes

trans-unit.source: Contains classes for native data types in SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes for native data types in SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: These classes provide a safer, faster alternative to the primitive data types provided in the System namespace.
trans-unit.target: These classes provide a safer, faster alternative to the primitive data types provided in the System namespace.

trans-unit.source: Using the classes in this namespace helps prevent type conversion errors caused by loss of precision.
trans-unit.target: Using the classes in this namespace helps prevent type conversion errors caused by loss of precision.

trans-unit.source: Because other data types are converted to and from SqlTypes behind the scenes, explicitly creating and using objects within this namespace also yields faster code.
trans-unit.target: Because other data types are converted to and from SqlTypes behind the scenes, explicitly creating and using objects within this namespace also yields faster code.

trans-unit.source: @System.Diagnostics
trans-unit.target: @System.Diagnostics

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that allow you to interact with system processes, event logs, and performance counters.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that allow you to interact with system processes, event logs, and performance counters.

trans-unit.source: @System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis
trans-unit.target: @System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis

trans-unit.source: Contains a class to suppress reporting of a specific rule violation by a static analysis tool.
trans-unit.target: Contains a class to suppress reporting of a specific rule violation by a static analysis tool.

trans-unit.source: @System.Diagnostics.Contracts
trans-unit.target: @System.Diagnostics.Contracts

trans-unit.source: Contains static classes for representing program contracts such as preconditions, postconditions, and invariants.
trans-unit.target: Contains static classes for representing program contracts such as preconditions, postconditions, and invariants.

trans-unit.source: @System.Diagnostics.Tracing
trans-unit.target: @System.Diagnostics.Tracing

trans-unit.source: Provides types and members that enable you to create strongly-typed events to be captured by Event Tracing for Windows (ETW).
trans-unit.target: Provides types and members that enable you to create strongly-typed events to be captured by Event Tracing for Windows (ETW).

trans-unit.source: @System.Drawing
trans-unit.target: @System.Drawing

trans-unit.source: Provides access to basic graphics functionality.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to basic graphics functionality.

trans-unit.source: @System.Dynamic
trans-unit.target: @System.Dynamic

trans-unit.source: Provides classes and interfaces that support the Dynamic Language Runtime.
trans-unit.target: Provides classes and interfaces that support the Dynamic Language Runtime.

trans-unit.source: @System.Globalization
trans-unit.target: @System.Globalization

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that define culture-related information, including language, country/region, calendars in use, format patterns for dates, currency, and numbers, and sort order for strings.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that define culture-related information, including language, country/region, calendars in use, format patterns for dates, currency, and numbers, and sort order for strings.

trans-unit.source: These classes are useful for writing globalized (internationalized) applications.
trans-unit.target: These classes are useful for writing globalized (internationalized) applications.

trans-unit.source: @System.IO
trans-unit.target: @System.IO

trans-unit.source: Contains types that allow reading and writing to files and data streams, and types that provide basic file and directory support.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that allow reading and writing to files and data streams, and types that provide basic file and directory support.

trans-unit.source: @System.IO.Compression
trans-unit.target: @System.IO.Compression

trans-unit.source: Contains types that provide basic compression and decompression services for streams.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that provide basic compression and decompression services for streams.

trans-unit.source: @System.IO.IsolatedStorage
trans-unit.target: @System.IO.IsolatedStorage

trans-unit.source: Contains types that allow the creation and use of isolated stores.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that allow the creation and use of isolated stores.

trans-unit.source: Isolated stores let you read and write data that less trusted code cannot access, and prevent the exposure of sensitive information that can be saved elsewhere on the file system.
trans-unit.target: Isolated stores let you read and write data that less trusted code cannot access, and prevent the exposure of sensitive information that can be saved elsewhere on the file system.

trans-unit.source: Data is stored in compartments that are isolated by the current user and by the assembly in which the code exists.
trans-unit.target: Data is stored in compartments that are isolated by the current user and by the assembly in which the code exists.

trans-unit.source: Roaming profiles can be used in conjunction with isolated storage so that isolated stores travel with the user's profile.
trans-unit.target: Roaming profiles can be used in conjunction with isolated storage so that isolated stores travel with the user's profile.

trans-unit.source: @System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles
trans-unit.target: @System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles

trans-unit.source: Contains classes for using a memory-mapped file, which maps the contents of a file to an application’s logical address space.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes for using a memory-mapped file, which maps the contents of a file to an application’s logical address space.

trans-unit.source: @System.IO.Packaging
trans-unit.target: @System.IO.Packaging

trans-unit.source: Contains types that support storage of multiple data objects in a single container.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that support storage of multiple data objects in a single container.

trans-unit.source: @System.IO.Pipes
trans-unit.target: @System.IO.Pipes

trans-unit.source: Contains types for interprocess communication through anonymous and/or named pipes.
trans-unit.target: Contains types for interprocess communication through anonymous and/or named pipes.

trans-unit.source: @System.Linq
trans-unit.target: @System.Linq

trans-unit.source: Contains types that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).
trans-unit.target: Contains types that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

trans-unit.source: @System.Linq.Expressions
trans-unit.target: @System.Linq.Expressions

trans-unit.source: Contains types that enable language-level code expressions to be represented as objects in the form of expression trees.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that enable language-level code expressions to be represented as objects in the form of expression trees.

trans-unit.source: @System.Net
trans-unit.target: @System.Net

trans-unit.source: Provides a simple programming interface for many of the protocols used on networks today.
trans-unit.target: Provides a simple programming interface for many of the protocols used on networks today.

trans-unit.source: @System.Net.Http
trans-unit.target: @System.Net.Http

trans-unit.source: Provides a programming interface for modern HTTP applications.
trans-unit.target: Provides a programming interface for modern HTTP applications.

trans-unit.source: @System.Net.Http.Headers
trans-unit.target: @System.Net.Http.Headers

trans-unit.source: Provides support for collections of HTTP headers used by the @System.Net.Http namespace.
trans-unit.target: Provides support for collections of HTTP headers used by the @System.Net.Http namespace.

trans-unit.source: @System.Net.NetworkInformation
trans-unit.target: @System.Net.NetworkInformation

trans-unit.source: Provides access to network traffic data, network address information, and notification of address changes for the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to network traffic data, network address information, and notification of address changes for the local computer.

trans-unit.source: The namespace also contains classes that implement the @System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping utility.
trans-unit.target: The namespace also contains classes that implement the @System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping utility.

trans-unit.source: You can use Ping and related classes to check whether a computer is reachable across the network.
trans-unit.target: You can use Ping and related classes to check whether a computer is reachable across the network.

trans-unit.source: @System.Net.Security
trans-unit.target: @System.Net.Security

trans-unit.source: Provides network streams for secure communications between hosts.
trans-unit.target: Provides network streams for secure communications between hosts.

trans-unit.source: @System.Net.Sockets
trans-unit.target: @System.Net.Sockets

trans-unit.source: Provides a managed sockets implementation for developers who need to tightly control access to the network.
trans-unit.target: Provides a managed sockets implementation for developers who need to tightly control access to the network.

trans-unit.source: @System.Net.WebSockets
trans-unit.target: @System.Net.WebSockets

trans-unit.source: Provides a managed implementation of the WebSocket interface for developers.
trans-unit.target: Provides a managed implementation of the WebSocket interface for developers.

trans-unit.source: @System.Numerics
trans-unit.target: @System.Numerics

trans-unit.source: Contains numeric types that complement the numeric primitives (such as Byte, Double, and Int32) that are available in .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: Contains numeric types that complement the numeric primitives (such as Byte, Double, and Int32) that are available in .NET Core.

trans-unit.source: @System.Reflection
trans-unit.target: @System.Reflection

trans-unit.source: Contains types that retrieve information at runtime about assemblies, modules, members, parameters, and other entities in managed code by examining their metadata.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that retrieve information at runtime about assemblies, modules, members, parameters, and other entities in managed code by examining their metadata.

trans-unit.source: These types also can be used to manipulate instances of loaded types, for example to hook up events or to invoke methods.
trans-unit.target: These types also can be used to manipulate instances of loaded types, for example to hook up events or to invoke methods.

trans-unit.source: @System.Reflection.Context
trans-unit.target: @System.Reflection.Context

trans-unit.source: Contains single class that can be used to create a customized reflection context.
trans-unit.target: Contains single class that can be used to create a customized reflection context.

trans-unit.source: @System.Reflection.Emit
trans-unit.target: @System.Reflection.Emit

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that can emit metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) and optionally generate a PE file on disk.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that can emit metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) and optionally generate a PE file on disk.

trans-unit.source: The primary clients of these classes are script engines and compilers.
trans-unit.target: The primary clients of these classes are script engines and compilers.

trans-unit.source: @System.Reflection.Metadata
trans-unit.target: @System.Reflection.Metadata

trans-unit.source: Contains a class with single extension method that retrieves raw metadata from an assembly.
trans-unit.target: Contains a class with single extension method that retrieves raw metadata from an assembly.

trans-unit.source: @System.Resources
trans-unit.target: @System.Resources

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that allow developers to create, store, and retrieve culture-specific string resources used in an application.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that allow developers to create, store, and retrieve culture-specific string resources used in an application.

trans-unit.source: One of its most important classes is the @System.Resources.ResourceManager class.
trans-unit.target: One of its most important classes is the @System.Resources.ResourceManager class.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime

trans-unit.source: Contains types that control the operation of the runtime's garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that control the operation of the runtime's garbage collector.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.CompilerServices
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.CompilerServices

trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for compiler writers who use managed code to specify attributes in metadata that affect the run-time behavior of the runtime.
trans-unit.target: Provides functionality for compiler writers who use managed code to specify attributes in metadata that affect the run-time behavior of the runtime.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.ExceptionServices
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.ExceptionServices

trans-unit.source: Contains a single class to represent an exception whose state is captured at a certain point in code.
trans-unit.target: Contains a single class to represent an exception whose state is captured at a certain point in code.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.InteropServices
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.InteropServices

trans-unit.source: Provides a wide variety of members that support COM interop and platform invoke services.
trans-unit.target: Provides a wide variety of members that support COM interop and platform invoke services.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes

trans-unit.source: Contains types that represent COM interfaces and data used in COM function calls.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that represent COM interfaces and data used in COM function calls.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime

trans-unit.source: Contains types that support interoperation between managed code and the Windows Runtime, and that enable the creation of Windows Runtime types with managed code.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that support interoperation between managed code and the Windows Runtime, and that enable the creation of Windows Runtime types with managed code.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.Loader
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.Loader

trans-unit.source: Contains a single class that represents an assembly's load context.
trans-unit.target: Contains a single class that represents an assembly's load context.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.Serialization
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.Serialization

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that can be used for serializing and deserializing objects.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that can be used for serializing and deserializing objects.

trans-unit.source: Serialization converts an object or a graph of objects into a linear sequence of bytes for either storage or transmission to another location.
trans-unit.target: Serialization converts an object or a graph of objects into a linear sequence of bytes for either storage or transmission to another location.

trans-unit.source: Deserialization recreates objects from this stored information.
trans-unit.target: Deserialization recreates objects from this stored information.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.Serialization.Json
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.Serialization.Json

trans-unit.source: Provides classes related to JSON serialization.
trans-unit.target: Provides classes related to JSON serialization.

trans-unit.source: @System.Runtime.Versioning
trans-unit.target: @System.Runtime.Versioning

trans-unit.source: Contains advanced types that support versioning in side-by-side implementations of the .NET Platform Standard.
trans-unit.target: Contains advanced types that support versioning in side-by-side implementations of the .NET Platform Standard.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security
trans-unit.target: @System.Security

trans-unit.source: Provides the underlying structure of the runtime's security system, including base classes for permissions.
trans-unit.target: Provides the underlying structure of the runtime's security system, including base classes for permissions.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.AccessControl
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.AccessControl

trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic elements that control access to and audit security-related actions on securable objects.
trans-unit.target: Provides programmatic elements that control access to and audit security-related actions on securable objects.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.Authentication
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.Authentication

trans-unit.source: Contains authentication exception types and a set of enumerations that describe the security of a connection.
trans-unit.target: Contains authentication exception types and a set of enumerations that describe the security of a connection.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection

trans-unit.source: Provides support for authentication using extended protection for applications.
trans-unit.target: Provides support for authentication using extended protection for applications.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.Claims
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.Claims

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that implement claims-based identity, including classes that represent claims, claims-based identities, and claims-based principals.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that implement claims-based identity, including classes that represent claims, claims-based identities, and claims-based principals.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.Cryptography
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.Cryptography

trans-unit.source: Provides cryptographic services, including secure encoding and decoding of data, as well as many other operations, such as hashing, random number generation, and message authentication.
trans-unit.target: Provides cryptographic services, including secure encoding and decoding of data, as well as many other operations, such as hashing, random number generation, and message authentication.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs

trans-unit.source: Provides programming elements for Public Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS), including methods for signing data, exchanging keys, requesting certificates, public key encryption and decryption, and other security functions.
trans-unit.target: Provides programming elements for Public Key Cryptography Standards (PKCS), including methods for signing data, exchanging keys, requesting certificates, public key encryption and decryption, and other security functions.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates

trans-unit.source: Contains the runtime's implementation of the Authenticode X.509 v.3 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Contains the runtime's implementation of the Authenticode X.509 v.3 certificate.

trans-unit.source: This certificate is signed with a private key that uniquely and positively identifies the holder of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: This certificate is signed with a private key that uniquely and positively identifies the holder of the certificate.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.Cryptography.Xml
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.Cryptography.Xml

trans-unit.source: Contains a single type that represents the <X509IssuerSerial> element of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Contains a single type that represents the <X509IssuerSerial> element of an XML digital signature.

trans-unit.source: @System.Security.Principal
trans-unit.target: @System.Security.Principal

trans-unit.source: Defines a principal object that represents the security context under which code is running.
trans-unit.target: Defines a principal object that represents the security context under which code is running.

trans-unit.source: @System.ServiceModel
trans-unit.target: @System.ServiceModel

trans-unit.source: Provides classes related to the service model.
trans-unit.target: Provides classes related to the service model.

trans-unit.source: @System.ServiceModel.Channels
trans-unit.target: @System.ServiceModel.Channels

trans-unit.source: Provides classes related to service model channels.
trans-unit.target: Provides classes related to service model channels.

trans-unit.source: @System.ServiceModel.Description
trans-unit.target: @System.ServiceModel.Description

trans-unit.source: Provides classes related to the service model description.
trans-unit.target: Provides classes related to the service model description.

trans-unit.source: @System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher
trans-unit.target: @System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher

trans-unit.source: Provides classes related to dispatching the service model.
trans-unit.target: Provides classes related to dispatching the service model.

trans-unit.source: @System.ServiceModel.Security
trans-unit.target: @System.ServiceModel.Security

trans-unit.source: Deals with general security-related topics.
trans-unit.target: Deals with general security-related topics.

trans-unit.source: @System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens
trans-unit.target: @System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens

trans-unit.source: Deals with security tokens and certificates.
trans-unit.target: Deals with security tokens and certificates.

trans-unit.source: @System.ServiceProcess
trans-unit.target: @System.ServiceProcess

trans-unit.source: Provides types that allow you to connect to and control a Windows service application.
trans-unit.target: Provides types that allow you to connect to and control a Windows service application.

trans-unit.source: Windows services are long-running executables with no user interface.
trans-unit.target: Windows services are long-running executables with no user interface.

trans-unit.source: @System.Text
trans-unit.target: @System.Text

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that represent ASCII and Unicode character encodings; abstract base classes for converting blocks of characters to and from blocks of bytes; and a helper class that manipulates and formats @System.String objects without creating intermediate @System.String instances.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that represent ASCII and Unicode character encodings; abstract base classes for converting blocks of characters to and from blocks of bytes; and a helper class that manipulates and formats @System.String objects without creating intermediate @System.String instances.

trans-unit.source: @System.Text.RegularExpressions
trans-unit.target: @System.Text.RegularExpressions

trans-unit.source: Contains classes that represent the .NET regular expression engine, which allows you to search text for particular patterns.
trans-unit.target: Contains classes that represent the .NET regular expression engine, which allows you to search text for particular patterns.

trans-unit.source: @System.Threading
trans-unit.target: @System.Threading

trans-unit.source: Provides types that enable multithreaded programming.
trans-unit.target: Provides types that enable multithreaded programming.

trans-unit.source: In addition to classes for synchronizing thread activities and access to data (such as @System.Threading.Mutex, @System.Threading.Monitor, @System.Threading.Interlocked, and @System.Threading.AutoResetEvent), this namespace includes a @System.Threading.ThreadPool class that allows you to use a pool of system-supplied threads, and a @System.Threading.Timer class that executes callback methods on thread pool threads.
trans-unit.target: In addition to classes for synchronizing thread activities and access to data (such as @System.Threading.Mutex, @System.Threading.Monitor, @System.Threading.Interlocked, and @System.Threading.AutoResetEvent), this namespace includes a @System.Threading.ThreadPool class that allows you to use a pool of system-supplied threads, and a @System.Threading.Timer class that executes callback methods on thread pool threads.

trans-unit.source: @System.Threading.Tasks
trans-unit.target: @System.Threading.Tasks

trans-unit.source: Provides types that simplify the work of writing concurrent and asynchronous code.
trans-unit.target: Provides types that simplify the work of writing concurrent and asynchronous code.

trans-unit.source: The main types are @System.Threading.Tasks.Task, which represents an asynchronous operation that can be waited on and canceled, and @System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601, which is a task that can return a value.
trans-unit.target: The main types are @System.Threading.Tasks.Task, which represents an asynchronous operation that can be waited on and canceled, and @System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601, which is a task that can return a value.

trans-unit.source: @System.Windows.Input
trans-unit.target: @System.Windows.Input

trans-unit.source: Defines a single interface, @System.Windows.Input.ICommand, that can be used to provide the commanding behavior for UI elements in Windows Runtime apps.
trans-unit.target: Defines a single interface, @System.Windows.Input.ICommand, that can be used to provide the commanding behavior for UI elements in Windows Runtime apps.

trans-unit.source: @System.Xml
trans-unit.target: @System.Xml

trans-unit.source: Provides standards-based support for processing XML.
trans-unit.target: Provides standards-based support for processing XML.

trans-unit.source: @System.Xml.Linq
trans-unit.target: @System.Xml.Linq

trans-unit.source: Contains types that support LINQ to XML, an in-memory XML programming interface that lets you modify XML documents efficiently and easily.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that support LINQ to XML, an in-memory XML programming interface that lets you modify XML documents efficiently and easily.

trans-unit.source: @System.Xml.Schema
trans-unit.target: @System.Xml.Schema

trans-unit.source: Contains types that provide standards-based support for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that provide standards-based support for XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas.

trans-unit.source: @System.Xml.Serialization
trans-unit.target: @System.Xml.Serialization

trans-unit.source: Contains types that are used to serialize objects into XML format documents or streams.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that are used to serialize objects into XML format documents or streams.

trans-unit.source: @System.Xml.XPath
trans-unit.target: @System.Xml.XPath

trans-unit.source: Contains types that define a cursor model for navigating and editing XML information items as instances of the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that define a cursor model for navigating and editing XML information items as instances of the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

trans-unit.source: @System.Xml.Xsl
trans-unit.target: @System.Xml.Xsl

trans-unit.source: Provides support for Extensible Stylesheet Transformation (XSLT) transforms.
trans-unit.target: Provides support for Extensible Stylesheet Transformation (XSLT) transforms.

trans-unit.source: It supports the W3C XSL Transformations (XSLT) Version 1.0 Recommendation.
trans-unit.target: It supports the W3C XSL Transformations (XSLT) Version 1.0 Recommendation.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.Foundation
trans-unit.target: @Windows.Foundation

trans-unit.source: Contains some basic types used in Universal Windows Platform apps.
trans-unit.target: Contains some basic types used in Universal Windows Platform apps.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.UI
trans-unit.target: @Windows.UI

trans-unit.source: Contains a @Windows.UI.Color type used in Universal Windows Platform apps.
trans-unit.target: Contains a @Windows.UI.Color type used in Universal Windows Platform apps.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.UI.Xaml
trans-unit.target: @Windows.UI.Xaml

trans-unit.source: Contains XAML-related types used in Universal Windows Platform apps.
trans-unit.target: Contains XAML-related types used in Universal Windows Platform apps.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Automation
trans-unit.target: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Automation

trans-unit.source: Contains exception types for exceptions thrown by routines that implement UI automation support for custom controls in Universal Windows Platform apps.
trans-unit.target: Contains exception types for exceptions thrown by routines that implement UI automation support for custom controls in Universal Windows Platform apps.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives
trans-unit.target: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives

trans-unit.source: Contains a single type, @Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition, that describes the position of an item in a Universal Windows Platform app.
trans-unit.target: Contains a single type, @Windows.UI.Xaml.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition, that describes the position of an item in a Universal Windows Platform app.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Markup
trans-unit.target: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Markup

trans-unit.source: Contains an exception type that represents a Xaml parsing error.
trans-unit.target: Contains an exception type that represents a Xaml parsing error.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media
trans-unit.target: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media

trans-unit.source: Contains a single type, @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Matrix, which represents a 3 × 3 affine transformation matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space in Universal Windows Platform apps.
trans-unit.target: Contains a single type, @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Matrix, which represents a 3 × 3 affine transformation matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space in Universal Windows Platform apps.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation
trans-unit.target: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation

trans-unit.source: Contains types that provide information about transition animations or animated UI components in Universal Windows Platform apps.
trans-unit.target: Contains types that provide information about transition animations or animated UI components in Universal Windows Platform apps.

trans-unit.source: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Media3D
trans-unit.target: @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Media3D

trans-unit.source: Contains a single type, @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D, that represents a 4 × 4 matrix used for transformations in a 3-D space in Universal Windows Platform apps.
trans-unit.target: Contains a single type, @Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D, that represents a 4 × 4 matrix used for transformations in a 3-D space in Universal Windows Platform apps.

trans-unit.source: Improving the Documentation
trans-unit.target: Improving the Documentation

trans-unit.source: If you find an issue or an inconsistency, we would love to hear about it!
trans-unit.target: If you find an issue or an inconsistency, we would love to hear about it!

trans-unit.source: Go to the [.NET Core docs repo](https://github.com/dotnet/core-docs/ ".NET Core docs repo") on Github, and open an issue to let us know.
trans-unit.target: Go to the [.NET Core docs repo](https://github.com/dotnet/core-docs/ ".NET Core docs repo") on Github, and open an issue to let us know.
